name: Pew pew (1 hour game jam 164)
description:
My first ever game jam game. Pew pew was submitted to the 164th one hour game jam with the theme "Your favourite game, but the simplest possible".

Use space bar to command your turret to shoot falling test subjects. You have 3 lives, get the highest score possible!

This game is inspired by my favourite game of all time, portal.
